channel.title: Applet cache unzipping error
channel.description:
Hi.
Recently tried to make a webclient with the cache downloader class, etc.
However, it doesn't unzip my cache correctly. It is zipped correctly. It doesn't want to extract the folder within the cache zip file (data-->animations, models, etc).
I can't figure out how to get it to work..
[code]Downloading Cache 100% cache.zip 65162122 Finished downloading cache.zip! unzipping2 main_file_cache.dat unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx0 unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx1 unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx2 unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx3 unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx4 unzipping2 null_cache.dat unzipping2 null_cache.idx unzipping2 Data/Animation/ java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\HorizonXcache\Data\Animation\flo.dat (The syst em cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:192) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:178) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:81) at client.startUp(client.java:8142) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5590) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) UNZIP java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\HorizonXcache\data.dat (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at NamedArchive.getBytesFromFile(NamedArchive.java:63) at NamedArchive.<init>(NamedArchive.java:10) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4340) at client.startUp(client.java:8173) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5590) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at client.preloadModels(client.java:910) at client.startUp(client.java:8189) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5590) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60 Here6 Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Applet cache unzipping error
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Hi.

Recently tried to make a webclient with the cache downloader class, etc.

However, it doesn’t unzip my cache correctly. It is zipped correctly. It doesn’t want to extract the folder within the cache zip file (data–>animations, models, etc).

I can’t figure out how to get it to work…

Downloading Cache 100% cache.zip 65162122 Finished downloading cache.zip! unzipping2 main_file_cache.dat unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx0 unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx1 unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx2 unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx3 unzipping2 main_file_cache.idx4 unzipping2 null_cache.dat unzipping2 null_cache.idx unzipping2 Data/Animation/ java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\HorizonXcache\Data\Animation\flo.dat (The syst em cannot find the path specified) at java.io.FileOutputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at CacheDownloader.unzip(CacheDownloader.java:192) at CacheDownloader.unZip(CacheDownloader.java:178) at CacheDownloader.downloadCache(CacheDownloader.java:81) at client.startUp(client.java:8142) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5590) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) UNZIP java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\HorizonXcache\data.dat (The system cannot find the file specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(Unknown Source) at NamedArchive.getBytesFromFile(NamedArchive.java:63) at NamedArchive.<init>(NamedArchive.java:10) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4340) at client.startUp(client.java:8173) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5590) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at client.preloadModels(client.java:910) at client.startUp(client.java:8189) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:5590) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Connecting to update server 60 Here6 Press any key to continue . . .
